thread.title: BREAKING: Wrong Best Picture winner read out at Oscars in EPIC gaffe
thread.title_full: BREAKING: Wrong Best Picture winner read out at Oscars in EPIC gaffe

title: BREAKING: Wrong Best Picture winner read out at Oscars in EPIC gaffe
text:
Wrong Best Picture winner read out at Oscars in EPIC gaffe Wrong Best Picture winner read out at Oscars in EPIC gaffe THIS could be the worst Oscars mistake of all time. / Published 27th February 2017 
La La Land was mistakenly read out as the Best Picture winner at the 89th Academy Awards. 
Warren Beatty accidentally named La La Land as the winner, when Moonlight, in fact, had won. 
In a bizarre mistake, Damien Chazelle and the cast of the musical La La Land went on stage after Beatty read out La La Land as the winner. 
GETTY WTAF? The wrong Best Picture winner was announced Oscars 2017: Red carpet LIVE Sunday, 26th February 2017 Oscars 2017: All the red carpet action from the 89th Annual Academy Awards in Hollywood. 1 / 100 
However, after the cast gave their speeches, it emerged that Moonlight had won the prize. 
It is believed that Beatty was given the wrong envelope, and was actually reading from the envelope which announced Emma Stone as the Best Actress winner. 
La La Land's cast and crew were then forced to leave the stage, while Moonlight came on to accept the prize. Related articles
